Flow.description: A new project record would be created whenever the opportunity is not closed won or completed

value.stringValue:
AND ( OR (ISCHANGED([Opportunity].ProServ_Scoping_requested_needed__c), ISNEW()), [Opportunity].Opportunity_Country__c != "MX", [Opportunity].ProServ_Scoping_requested_needed__c = True, OR ( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'MQL'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Sales Acceptance'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Qualify'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Develop'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Prove'), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Negotiate') ), AND( INCLUDES([Opportunity].Service_Type__c, "Technical"), INCLUDES([Opportunity].Service_Type__c, "Implementation"))
)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression:
AND ( OR (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.ProServ_Scoping_requested_needed__c}), ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Country__c} != "MX", {!myVariable_current.ProServ_Scoping_requested_needed__c} = True, OR ( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'MQL'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Sales Acceptance'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Qualify'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Develop'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Prove'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Negotiate') ), AND( INCLUDES({!myVariable_current.Service_Type__c}, "Technical"), INCLUDES({!myVariable_current.Service_Type__c}, "Implementation"))
)
